Html: No, seriously, thanks, does it have a license? you did a very good job

Yeah, the license is "the first one who gets rich with this code has to give a cool job to the other contributors ;) "

Seriously, it s MS PL, microsoft public / permissive license, read it here http://techcraft.codeplex.com/license,  you can use the code commercially .
